items.title: Unity 2D Farming Course
items.summary: Course Description This comprehensive course will guide you through the process of creating a fully functional 2D farming game in…
items.content_html:
Course Description

This comprehensive course will guide you through the process of creating a fully functional 2D farming game in Unity, all within the span of 20 hours. You'll learn the essential concepts of game development, from setting up your project to implementing core gameplay mechanics, such as planting, harvesting, and managing crops and animals.

Instructor

ùó°ùóîùó†ùóò: Ada Arkane Kaminkure

ùóóùóòùóöùó•ùóòùóò:
- Chulalongkorn University, Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
- Unity Certified

Expertise: Game Design and Development, Software Engineer, Mathematics

items.summary: We don't make games just to pass the time. We craft experiences that ignite imaginations, challenge perceptions, and forge unexpected…
items.content_html:
We don't make games just to pass the time. We craft experiences that ignite imaginations, challenge perceptions, and forge unexpected connections.
